  "message": "Queue file count exceeded safe limit."
}

properties.Message:
⚠ NiFi ALERT DETECTED – QUEUE FILE HIGH
Timestamp
${now():format("yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss")}
Queue File Count
Alert Type: QUEUE_FILE_HIGH
Metric: Queue FlowFiles
Current Value: ${queuedFlowFiles}
Threshold: ${queuedFlowFiles_threshold}
Details: Queue file count exceeded safe limit.
NiFi Monitoring System – Automated Alert Notification
properties.Subject: NiFi Alert QUEUE FILES
